casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Dirk Douglas THOMAS aka Dirk Thomas NO. 2018-KO-1841 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 22, 2019

WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the courts below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b).
